page.title: 12Schools near Doncaster.
page.content: There are several types of school. The schools range from Infants to Comprehensives. In the Infants in{ {Armthorpe}you have to be 5 years old to go there. When you come out you are 7 years old. Juniors you start at 7 years old and leave at 11 to go to the Comprehensives which you leave when you are aged 16 or 18. In the First Schools at{Edenthorpe}and {Kirk Sandall}you are 5 when you start and 8 when you leave. Then you go to Middle Schools till you are 12, when you go to a Comprehensive. Only at the Comprehensives do you have to wear uniform. At the other schools you have a choice. {Shaw Wood}is the only school in our Block to have its own swimming pool. Most of the schools have their own playing fields. Some have facilities for netball, basketball & other games.
